title: New medicare model produces expert nurses to address shortage of primary care

title_detail.value: New medicare model produces expert nurses to address shortage of primary care

summary: Researchers call for modernizing the way Medicare pays for training nurses, and highlight a successful new model of cost-effectively training more advanced practice nurses to practice community-based primary care.

summary_detail.value: Researchers call for modernizing the way Medicare pays for training nurses, and highlight a successful new model of cost-effectively training more advanced practice nurses to practice community-based primary care.
